attributes.additional_details:
As Sir David Attenborough has just completed his final series before retirement he should be required to record every word in the Oxford English Dictionary into electronic format so his computer generated voice can be used to narrate all future nature documentaries.

This way we can ensure that Sir Attenborough and his soft, dulcet tones can be enjoyed ad-infinitum on every nature documentary ever produced in the future.

Lets face it there is nobody on the planet who could replace him.
